text: Goodbye Im on the verge of suicide  My heart is torn up and shattered  Im at a loss of emotion and feeling  I have no idea what I m doing  Where I m going or even who I am  But this is it  I ve felt this pain for way to long  It s over Reddit  Thanks for making me smile  But I dont think I can do this anymore  It hurts too much and im just done  Thank you to the redditors who spoke to me   I dont know if I ll go through with this but Incase  Goodbye  Im so sorry for being a failure to this world  for being a mess and hurting people  Im history now
summary: On the verge of suicide, a Reddit user wrote a message to the redditors who helped him. He is sorry for being a failure to the world and hurting people. He doesn't know if he will go through with it, but he is sorry.
